comment.author: 36645048@N00
comment._content: As he gives precedence to the Order of the Garter and the Order of the Bath over his German orders I think this was taken in June 1887 when he attended Queen Victoria's Golden Jubilee. Victoria was his mother-in-law. He was dead a year later.

comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frederick_III,_German_Emperor (18 October 1831 – 15 June 1888) His reign lasted only 99 days.
